game.name: PAYDAY 2: Scarface Heist
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: YOU WANNA PLAY ROUGH?The Scarface™ Heist Pack is the 37th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Scarface™ Heist Pack comes with The Scarface™ Mansion Heist, 2 new weapons, 4 masks, materials and patterns and 6 Achievements.
game.shortDescriptionEn: YOU WANNA PLAY ROUGH?The Scarface™ Heist Pack is the 37th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Scarface™ Heist Pack comes with The Scarface™ Mansion Heist, 2 new weapons, 4 masks, materials and patterns and 6 Achievements.
